name: STUDY
description:
(this is my first time making a platformer, and I wish I never chose platformer..)

In the study minigame, make sure your bored meter doesn't reach 75, or else your study will decrease dramatically! Keeping your study meter at 75 or above makes the enemies slower in the platformer section!

Studytime ends at 12:00 AM

I gave up making the game look prettier for this game jam, so I hope it is decent enough to your tastes ;d

Controls:

Studying Minigame : Left/Right arrow key to toggle studying and sleeping

Platformer: A/D/Space for movement

Songs are made in Musecore with the soundfonts: NiceKeys Steinway, and N64 Soundfont.

Sprites done in Aseprite

Made with Unity 2017
